'''1.1.1''' is a [[launcher]] version released on July 18, 2013.

== Changes ==

* New-look launcher and login screen
* Launcher now closes automatically when game window opens

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.1.1|project=MCL

|599|IllegalStateException on login during assets download
|945|Copying profile of Account 1 will overwrite Account 1's name to Account's 2 name after logging in with Account 2 (Donor Account gets changed to Recipient Account)
|983|Multiple Types of Minecraft Crashes on Launch - Mac
|1184|Launcher doesn't close when requested
|1199|Attempting to close Launcher freezes Launcher
}}
